summary: Proposal to improve the Worker API by allowing Worker#run to accept a block and deprecating the separate Worker#start method, streamlining the Worker lifecycle management in the Ruby SDK.
userImpact: Users would benefit from a more Ruby-idiomatic API with simplified Worker lifecycle management.
proposedFix: Modify Worker#run to accept an optional block parameter and deprecate Worker#start method.
resolutionDetails: Worker#run was enhanced to accept a block, providing more idiomatic Ruby API patterns while the separate start method was deprecated.
